statements: UPDATE payment_transactions SET amount = 100.50, payment_method = 'Credit Card' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE payment_transactions SET transaction_date = '2022-03-15', fraud_detection = true WHERE user_id = 789;
UPDATE payment_transactions SET amount = 150.75, fraud_detection = true WHERE transaction_id = 1001
UPDATE payment_transactions SET recipient_id = 2001, payment_method = 'Credit Card', transaction_date = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 500
UPDATE TransactionHistory SET amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE FraudulentTransactions SET reason = 'Suspicious activity' WHERE transaction_id = 2005;
UPDATE TransactionHistory SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 123456;
UPDATE FraudulentTransactions SET reason = 'Unauthorized Access' WHERE user_id = 987654;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.50, status = 'processed', transaction_date = '2021-09-30' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-556642440000';
UPDATE customers SET address = '123 Main Street, New York' WHERE customer_id = '987e6543-12d3-a456-e89b-556642440001';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000.50, status = 'completed' WHERE transaction_id = '76f2126c-6c8c-4b48-b704-d742496adea4';
UPDATE customers SET address = '123 Main Street, City, Country' WHERE customer_id = 'd72c7560-89da-4a36-bf1a-63c0cad6ff31';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 200.00 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE customers SET customer_phone = '+1234567890', customer_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000.50, transaction_type = 'Credit' WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 500.25 WHERE account_id = (SELECT account_id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe');
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 150.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE user_details SET phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 200.50, transaction_date = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 12345 AND user_id = 56789;
UPDATE user_details SET phone_number = '(123) 456-7890', full_name = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = 98765;
